must_exit_playing.zh_cn: 你必需退出Play模式才能继续操作.
must_exit_playing.en_us: You must exit Playing mode to continue

must_start_services.zh_cn: 你必需启动XOR服务并等待其初始化完成.
must_start_services.en_us: You must start the XOR service and wait for its initializated.

want_reset_settings.zh_cn: 您确定要重置XOR.Settings配置文件吗?
want_reset_settings.en_us: Are you want to reset the XOR.Settings configuration file?

appdomain_unload_exception.zh_cn: AppDomain Unload期间发现有未正常关闭的{0}实例(Count={1}), 强制Unload将可能导致{2}无法正常释放(C++)继而导致crash!
appdomain_unload_exception.en_us: During AppDomain Unload, {0} instance (Count={1}) was not closed. Forcing Unload may cause {2} to not release(C++) and crash!

select_tscofnig.en_us: Please select the typescript configuration file (tsconfig. json)

file_watcher_tip.zh_cn: System.IO.FileSystemWatcher在部分Unity版本上不能正常工作, 可更新至最新LTS版后再次尝试. 或使用nodejs fs.wacth来替代FileSystemWatcher功能.
file_watcher_tip.en_us: System.IO.FileSystemWatcher does not work on some Unity versions.You should update Unity to the latest LTS version or use nodejs fs.watch to replace the FileSystemWatcher.

thread_safe_tip.zh_cn: 在C#脚本编译或进入Play模式时将会进行AppDomain Unload操作, 此时AppDomain将强制跨线程调用JsEnv.Dispose从而导致Unity Crash! 使用[THREAD_SAFE]宏定义能有效处理这种情况(Editor only).
thread_safe_tip.en_us: During C# script compilation or when entering Play mode, an AppDomain Unload operation will occur. At this moment, the AppDomain will forcefully invoke JsEnv.Dispose in a cross-thread manner, leading to a Unity Crash! The use of the [THREAD_SAFE] macro can effectively handle this situation (Editor only).

script_path_tip.zh_cn: 自动加载TsComponent依赖的脚本, 如使用webpack丶esbuild等构建工具合并脚本则不应启用此选项. 修改此选项后应重新同步所有组件, 它只在Editor环境下生效.
script_path_tip.en_us: Automatically loads scripts required by TsComponent. This option should not be enabled when using bundling tools such as webpack or esbuild to combine scripts. After modifying this option, all components should be resynchronized. It only takes effect in the Editor environment.

nodejs_unsupport.en_us: Nodejs is not available in the current environment

config_changed.zh_cn: 配置已更改, 是否保存?
config_changed.en_us: The configuration has been changed. Do you want to save it?

没有找到package.json文件, 配置文件无效:

invail_tsconfig.en_us:

dependents_uninstall.en_us:
The modules have not been installed. Please execute <npm install>or<yarn install>command:
